title: Off-duty cop shoots himself in foot inside Queens home
content:
An off-duty NYPD officer accidentally shot himself in the foot in a Queens home Sunday night, police said.
The 23-year-old cop, whose name was not released, was shot just after 8 p.m. inside a home on 95th Ave. and 120th St. in Richmond Hill, officials said.
Emergency personnel took him to Jamaica Hospital.
Police were still investigating how the shooting happened, an NYPD spokesman said.
